source_objects.description: From idea generation to creative confidence, the power of the subconcious to innovation and invention, come discover methods of creativity.

items.headline: Master the art of paper folding. Improve your concentration skills with Origami.
objectives_summary: Origami paper models from easy to advanced levels
Learn how to fold 56 different origami paper crafts
Improve your concentration skills by paper folding

objectives_summary: Icon gilding techniques

visible_instructors.job_title: Innovator, TEDx Speaker, Entrepreneur, Intrapreneur, Keynote

items.headline: A crash course on Innovation, start becoming a world-class Innovator, right away.
objectives_summary: Innovation, it's relevance and how important Innovation is to any organisation.
Myths of Innovation and roles of an Innovator.
The three key phases and the important steps to Innovation and pitching any innovation.

items.headline: Learn to Write from the Techniques of the Great Writers in English Literature
objectives_summary: How to use the techniques employed by some of the greatest writers in English Literature
How to create plot exposition like Shakespeare
How to write dialogue like Arthur Miller

objectives_summary: TEST YOUR INTELLGENCE !!

items.title: Learn to Generate Creative Business Ideas (100+ ways)

visible_instructors.name: Pragmatic Learning
visible_instructors.title: Pragmatic Learning Solutions
visible_instructors.job_title: Teach courses in management and technical areas

items.headline: You will learn multiple methods and tools for idea generation & problem solving in any business situation.
objectives_summary: Make You more creative in idea generation and problem solving so that you can stand out and accelerate your career
Provide you with a framework, methods and approach from Problem assessment to Idea generation to Idea presentation

items.title: Learn Pen and Ink with Watercolour Wash
items.headline: Draw the quaint Ambleside Bridgehouse in The Lake District, then finish off with watercolour washes.
objectives_summary: This is my second Pen and Ink with watercolours course, and here you will learn how to draw stonework in pen and ink then add lovely watercolour washes to develop the drawing. You will also learn that you can get more paintings from this one single drawing.

items.title: How to Write Your Own Horror Novel

items.headline: Examining What it Takes to Write a Great Work of Horror
objectives_summary: Develop interesting characters with compelling arcs
Draft outlines for full-sized books
Understand the key elements of the horror genre

items.title: Creative Thinking Through Mind Mapping Complete Course
items.headline: Learn how to increase your creativity (creative thinking) with mind mapping for personal, professional and academic use.
objectives_summary: How to think creatively using mind maps
How to master creative thinking in all occasions.
How to brainstorm new ideas using strategies

items.title: Creating Brilliant Beginnings in Storytelling
items.headline: Discover the art and craft of brilliant beginnings in storytelling.
objectives_summary: Discover powerful techniques great storytellers use to craft brilliant beginnings.
Discover storytelling elements that stimulate reader anticipation, suspense and engagement, inviting the reader into the story world.
Understand the power of body language, dialogue, and narration in building intriguing characters.

items.title: Neuro-therapeutic Arts Foundation
items.headline: Master the Basics of the Neuroarts therapeutic techniques.
objectives_summary: You will learn the very bare basics of Neurographica.
How to draw Neurographic Lines (Neurolines).
Metaphorical meanings of simple geometric shapes

items.title: Discover Abstract Painting - Part 2
items.headline: Use your senses to create amazing abstract paintings
objectives_summary: Create their own unique abstract artworks
Have a better understanding of abstract art
Why tuning into your senses can be a great advantage when learning about abstract painting

items.title: Writing short stage plays.
items.headline: Writing fifteen minutes plays following step by step guidelines.
objectives_summary: How to write a 10-15 minute play, ready for production.

You will learn all basics about the screeenwriting craft in theory but with a different more simple approach
You will learn extra ways to concentrate and create the ideal environment for writing
